verbose_text: Herein, we describe a self assembling polyelectrolyte multilayered (PEM) film coating with local immobilisation of calcitriol (Cal) in biphasic calcium phosphate (BCP) scaffolds to promote osteoporotic bone regeneration by targeting the calcium sensing receptor (CaSR).
evidence: calcium phosphate (BCP) scaffolds to promote osteoporotic bone regeneration by targeting the calcium
